title: Chronometer
description: One hour can change everything. For Evie Laythorne, those sixty minutes were the difference between life and death. She's the only person that really knows the truth about what happened at the top of the tower during that unexpected fall storm. If only walls could talk.Previously ranked #3 in Occult SuspenseSizzling daylight saving time noir mystery.Dark mystery. Discretion advised.
author: Camille Cabrera
